column5: For those interested this is a good article on the Sabres current owner and how he managed the team for the 8 years he owned it....he wasn't the best but saved the franchise from moving.  http://www.buffalonews.com/sports/sabres-nhl/article331357.ece
A updated article now that the sale is final.... http://www.buffalonews.com/sports/article331944.ece
Im excited........but heck, i was excited the last time we had a billionaire buy the team as well.  If nothing else......im just giddy over the potential for change

I would think it would have to get better....just like when someone buys a house...they put money into it...at least when first purchased...  Not really a hockey fan......will watch if they make the playoffs but that's about it...my oldest son is a HUGE Sabres fan....he lives out of town and purchases the NHL package so he can watch them.  Bob
